author: cbs8
title: Brooklyn Beanz Announces Release Party for "Nobody" Single
text:
Brooklyn rap artist announces date for single release party event
 LOS ANGELES, CA, October 02, Emerging Brooklyn rapper Brooklyn Beanz has announced the single release party event for his newest track titled "Nobody." Produced by Scott Styles, the new track is a definite club banger riddled with a heavy bassline and a catchy hook. "Nobody" is available on iTunes and can be heard on Youtube at http://buff.ly/1P4rtuH
Hosted by Will Stylz, the single release party will kick off at 7pm on Wednesday, October 14th at Fusion Lounge in Queens, NY. Brooklyn Beanz will be performing his hit single "Nobody" live. An unsigned artists and producers showcase will also take place during the event giving industry hopefuls a shot at a single distribution deal with RBC Records (E1 Entertainment).
With the single currently buzzing about online Brooklyn Beanz is currently prepping for several upcoming performances including an afterparty in Atlanta following the BET Hip Hop Awards. On Friday, October 9th Brooklyn Beanz will perform live on stage at ONYX. He'll also be performing at the A3C Music Festival in Atlanta on Saturday, October 10th.
About Brooklyn Beanz
Brooklyn Beanz is an emerging rap artist and owner of the independent record label GMB Music Group. Born and raised in Brooklyn, NY home of legendary artists and trendsetters Notorious B.I.G., Jay-Z, Nas and Sean "P. Diddy" Combs, Brooklyn Beanz's music is derived from true life experiences; his trials, tribulations, convictions and appeals as a testament to his life and legacy. Known for sharing his life experiences, Brooklyn Beanz continues to fuse genuine lyrical content with unforgettable beats.
Twitter: @BklynBeanz
